Text: Thanks for sharing this, can you lease upload graphic novels published by Kickstart such as "Heavy Water", "Bad Guys" and "Ward 6" (thanks so much)

You're most welcome, Mr.Bookworm.

Yes, I have all three of those, but all three of them were also previously uploaded to TPB. Please check and see if these torrents are still alive. If they aren't, we'll see what we can do...

@LeonardTSpock- I already check those torrents before asking you, those seems dead, no more seeders to those torrent, I'm hoping you can restored it, (thanks so much,... =)
Bad Guys is working. In fact, it's downloading at over 300 kbps. Heavy Water and Ward 6 don't seem to be starting, though. If they don't kick in at some point tonight I'll re-up them tomorrow.
Ward 6 is working, as well. I know, because I just accidentally re-downloaded the entire file. lol
